sentences.en: A cockroach can live several weeks with its head off.
sentences.cn: 蟑螂在头被切掉后仍能活好几个星期.

sentences.en: A species of cockroach sprays a substance , ethylacrolein, that is a kind of tear gas.
sentences.cn: 某种蟑螂喷射一种催泪性毒气――乙 基丙烯 醛.

sentences.en: Cang Li Man places back the cockroach on his right ear lobe.
sentences.cn: 仓里满把那头蟑螂放回了右边耳垂上.

sentences.en: Competitions include Skating Around Poverty and Welfare Hurdles. Mascots include a cockroach and a rat.
sentences.cn: 比赛项目包括贫穷和福利绕障碍滑冰，吉祥物是蟑螂和老鼠。

sentences.en: Does the cockroach undergo complete metamorphosis or incomplete metamorphosis?
sentences.cn: 蟑螂的成长期属于完全变态还是不完全变态?

sentences.en: He saw the cockroach scurry under it with the gecko far behind struggling to go under.
sentences.cn: 蟑螂急匆匆的从冰箱底下跑过去，壁虎在后面也努力的想要钻过去。

sentences.en: He stumbled to the door and found a six-foot cockroach standing there.
sentences.cn: 他跌跌撞撞地去打开门，见到一只六英尺高的蟑螂站在那儿！

sentences.en: How do cockroach and spider say he has not come back?
sentences.cn: 蟑螂和蜘蛛就说他怎么还没回来 啊 ?

sentences.en: I'm sorry , but I really can't. There's a cockroach.
sentences.cn: 对不起, 我真不行. 那里有一只蟑螂.

sentences.en: If a cockroach fall down a building, will it die?
sentences.cn: 到底蟑螂先生由高空(高楼大下)掉落地会唔会死!

sentences.en: If you solve the problem earlier, it won't be a cockroach problem.
sentences.cn: 如果你早点解决这个问题, 它就不会比原先还要来得严重了.

sentences.en: M : Kill it! Use the cockroach spray under the sink.
sentences.cn: 杀了它! 克蟑就放在水槽的下面.

sentences.en: She screamed when she found a cockroach in her bed.
sentences.cn: 她在床上找到一只蟑螂时大声尖叫.

sentences.en: She was forced to live in a cockroach - infested house.
sentences.cn: 她被迫住在一间蟑螂成群的房子里.

sentences.en: The cockroach liftes Tao Zi up from the floor by her arms.
sentences.cn: 蟑螂把陶子从地板上搀了起来.

sentences.en: The Cockroach, is me, changed from the spell of a sorcerer.
sentences.cn: 蟑螂 ﹐ 也就是“我” ﹐ 被魔法师施了咒语之后才变成蟑螂的.

sentences.en: Wednesday - very bad day - at lunch we experience our first cockroach.
sentences.cn: 星期三 - 很倒霉的一天.

sentences.en: You must be tough as a cockroach to survive my attack wave.
sentences.cn: 你这只臭蟑螂还挺强硬顶住了我的冲击波.

trans.tran_en: a large black or brown insect that lives in dirty houses, especially if they are warm and there is food to eat
